headline: NiSource Achieves IURC Regulatory Approval for GenCo Strategy
summary: MERRILLVILLE, Ind., September 24, 2025--NiSource Inc. has received Indiana Utility Regulatory Commission’s (IURC) approval for its NIPSCO Generation LLC (GenCo) declination petition.
